title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Design Pattern-Based Online Language Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate language proficiency and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design systematic online language courses using design patterns in a Virtual Learning Environment (VLE).
Learners can develop three or more mobile-optimized learning activity modules.
Learners can submit practical language course prototypes through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
